attributes.action: Extend the scope of the MOT test to all vehicles including motorbikes to ensure the noise level they emit is no higher than when they were manufactured.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reduce the noise on Britain's roads by making it illegal to modify vehicles and motorbikes so that they emit more engine noise than when they were originally manufactured. The annual MOT test should be extended so that a noise test is carried out on every vehicle, with the vehicle failing the test if the noise level exceeds the manufacturers specifications.
